21.ara-name: كتاب السير عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Narrated Malik :From Az-Zuhri, that Sa'ib bin Yazid said: "The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) took the Jizyah from the Zoroastrians of Bahrain, and 'Umar took it in Persia, and 'Uthman took it from the Persians." I asked Muhammad about this, so he said: "It is: 'Malik from Az-Zuhri from the Prophet (ﷺ)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي أَخْذِ الْجِزْيَةِ مِنَ الْمَجُوسِ
chapter.eng-name: About Taking The Jizyah From The Zoroastrians
